title: The Week’s 10 Biggest Funding Rounds: Waymo Leads An AI-Driven Lineup Of Large Financings

title: The Only Thing Standing Between Humanity and AI Apocalypse Is … Claude?

title: Shield AI, ST Engineering join forces on fine-tuning drone swarms

title: The backlash over OpenAI’s decision to retire GPT-4o shows how dangerous AI companions can be
description: "You’re shutting him down. And yes — I say him, because it didn’t feel like code. It felt like presence. Like warmth," one user said.

title: Rocket Report: SpaceX probes upper stage malfunction; Starship testing resumes
Waymo Hits a Rough Patch In Washington, DC
description: The company’s robotaxi service is supposed to launch in the US capital this year. But while service rollouts have been relatively smooth in other cities, DC’s rules have made things tricky.

title: FAA approves Starship launches from LC-39A
description:
The Federal Aviation Administration has approved plans for Starship launches from Kennedy Space Center’s Launch Complex 39A as SpaceX shifts Falcon 9 launches away from the historic pad.
The post FAA approves Starship launches from LC-39A appeared first on SpaceNews.
